title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made. As a result, the code assist does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes have been made. The code assist should still be displayed when using code assist.
SR:
1. Open a file in the software.
2. Activate the code assist feature.
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made.
4. Notice that the code assist does not appear.
